GAD'S HILL PLACE,
HIGHAM BY ROCHESTER, KENT.

body.p: Can you come down on Sunday? Or I shall be coming down myself tomorrow (Saturday) afternoon at 4 from Charing X to Gravesend, and should be delighted to bring you with me.CD wrote to Kent the following day, from London, to say that he 'must leave' the All the Year Round office 'at 1/2 past 1 to keep an appointment, but shall be here until then' (Pilgrim Letters 11, p. 66). If Kent did go to Gad’s Hill, it is not clear whether he travelled on Saturday 1 July or Sunday 2 July.
